CTreeNode * CCallExprTreeNode::RewriteIntoMIRForm ( CTreeNode *  Stmts  )  [virtual]

If the function being called takes any parameters, the expressions forming the values of those parameters are simplified here if required and replaced with compiler generated temporary variables. If none of the parameters are complex or there are no parameters then the tree returned is essentially an exact copy of the original.

See also:
CTreeNode.
